quote: Do your duty and a little more and the future will take care of itself. – Andrew Carnegie
fact: Ants closely resemble human manners:  When they wake, they stretch & appear to yawn in a human manner before taking up the tasks of the day.
joke: Did you hear about the campsite that got visited by Bigfoot? It got in tents.
